class.name: CVNet
class.description: Used to create and manipulate comprehensive artificial neural networks. [url=https://docs.opencv.org/4.x/db/d30/classcv_1_1dnn_1_1Net.html]More information here[/url].

method.name: dump
method.description: Outputs the net information to a string.

method.name: empty
method.description: Returns true if there are no layers in the network.

method.name: forward
method.description: Runs forward pass for the whole network.

method.name: setInput
method.description:
Sets the new input value for the network.
[u]Additional parameters:[/u] name: String, scale_factor: Float, mean: Vector3
